My prediction (and not something I'm advocating)...

- "President" Biden will be assassinated by some "right-wing" nut who will turn out to be a leftist stooge paid the pretend (or setup) to appear to be right-wing. This will allow the left to go even more authoritarian.
- Harris, the new President, will nominate Hillary Clinton as VP.
- Harris will be made to step down due to information revealed that she has been a paid stooge of China....
- all this clearing the way for Hillary to go on a power-hungry rage quest of initiating a new slew of people being "suicided"!
- The formation of multiple "fringe" political parties will start popping up and will play heavily into the 2022 & 2024 elections... which won't mean a thing because more "counting machines" will be implemented in more states causing power to be even more consolidated.
- There will become mass movements to "STOP VOTING" because votes are never actually counted and large swaths of the United States will completely lose faith in the federal government and stop paying taxes.
- We will see the upswing in "secession" statements from state leaders.
